argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumadd.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumadd.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumadd.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsumadd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsumadd.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsumadd.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumadd.h | |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) |
| 8 |  | gsumadd.fn | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 9 |  | gsumadd.hn | |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 1 | #P_submid | |- ( G e. Mnd -> B e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> B e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 16 | 1, 10 | #P_cntzcmn | |- ( ( G e. CMnd /\ B C_ B ) -> ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` B ) = B ) |
| 17 | 4, 15, 16 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` B ) = B ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_syl5sseqr | |- ( ph -> B C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` B ) ) |
| 19 | 1, 2, 3, 10, 12, 5, 8, 9, 14, 18, 6, 7 | #P_gsumzadd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
